John Heroy about

Writing

  • My Blog (mostly technical)
  • Stack Overflow
  • Quora

Projects

  • HK Equities, a web application for quickly searching the latest regulatory filings for Hong Kong-listed stocks. Comes with a free email notification service. Built with Ruby on Rails
  • Crème de la Crib, an ecommerce website selling imported European milk powder in Hong Kong and PRC. Built with Wordpress, hosted on Digital Ocean Singapore with China CDN (Qiniu 七牛) for performance
  • Open Stock Exchange, a demo live limit order book matching fake stock exchange orders, built with Node.js/Express and Socket.io
  • WeChat Public Chat, an open chat room accessible through both WeChat (微信) and web clients, build with Node.js/Express and Firebase
  • 2048: Imperial China Edition, a simple fork of Gabriele Cirulli's 2048 and my attempt to play around with CSS
